name: late-drop-petition
description: Department chair outlines the process for retroactive course drops.

events.content: Friend is trying to drop CSC 349 after the deadline due to medical stuff. What’s the process?
They’ll need the Late/Retroactive Withdrawal Petition.

Submit the petition with supporting documentation (doctor’s note, etc.) to the Registrar and CC the department chair. We only approve if the circumstance prevented participation during the affected term.
Turnaround is about 10 business days. Meanwhile the class still shows on the portal.
Thanks, we’ll gather the docs first.
